name: Solvent
tagDescription: Chemicals used to dissolve other substances.

name: Corrosive
tagDescription: Substances that cause damage to materials or living tissue.

name: Consumable
tagDescription: Items that are used up during experiments.

name: Filtration
tagDescription: Items used for separating solids from liquids/gases.

name: Microscopy
tagDescription: Items used for viewing samples under a microscope.

name: Handling
tagDescription: Items used for manipulating substances or objects.

name: Chemical Analysis
tagDescription: Items used in chemical analysis procedures.

name: Biological Sample Prep
tagDescription: Items used for preparing biological samples.

name: Reusable
tagDescription: Items that can be cleaned and used multiple times.
